resources.string: Drag the slider below to set the font size
After setting, will change the chat, menu font size. If there are problems or comments in the process, feedback to the administrator.
Sync settings web page font size
Turn on the sync setting successfully.
Turn off the sync setting successfully.

The web font size has been read synchronously to the system font size and is not allowed to be modified separately. You can adjust the system font size or turn off the sync setting in [Me]-[Settings]-[General]-[Font Size].
